description:
The sacred Sojourner’s Psalm to be performed at the Divine Dragon Festival is in danger of being cancelled due to Ahide’s schemes! Ellen and the Anos Fan Union are asked to take the stage instead as the Dilhade Demon King Choir. The Draconids are drawn in by their song and begin to sing along. Meanwhile, while trying to pursue and capture Ahide, Anos encounters Dietrich, the King of Agatha, who has received a prophecy from the Goddess of the Future Naphta.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le 6e psaume du Roi-démon, « Le voisin »
魔王讃美歌 第6番『隣人』
